game.title: Team Nomad
game.description: We are a group of indie game devs currently devoting ourselves to the development of Feather Weight, a chicken-collecting action game that is designed for streamer-viewer competition through Twitch.tv.

history.text: Our team formed in late 2015, a group of five seniors in the Computer Science: Computer Game Design major at University of California, Santa Cruz. We were all united by our love for Lead Designer Bill Lin's pitch: "A Twitch.tv survival game that encourages collaboration between the streamer and the viewers." After flexing our design muscles continuously in a rapid series of redesigns over the last few months, we are set to arrive at a product that is far removed from that vision. But in a good way.

With our deadlines rapidly approaching and our college days numbered, we are toiling away in the Unity engine, reaping the fruits of our bouts of designing and redesigning. And they are sweet. Feather Weight releases mid-June.

quote.description: A noble spirit embiggens the smallest man.
quote.name: Jebediah Springfield
quote.website: founder of the town of Springfield

quote.description: What if you don't make it to the stars? People won't even notice that I'm shooting for the moon. They'll just be like 'Why is this kid shooting?'
quote.name: Jeff Rosenstock
quote.website: on shooting for the moon and missing, but ending up among the stars

quote.description: Only Twitch can start forest fires.
quote.name: Alisa Prusa
